backend/main.mo: Manages video sessions, including creating sessions, storing segments, exposing public views, and updating segment statuses.
feature_evidence.json: Defines feature-to-file mappings and metadata for recent UX improvements, including error handling, Grok view, and generation flow updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of all frontend source files, describing styling, components, hooks, and provider behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and color variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets metadata and mounts the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app orchestrating the multi-step video generation flow, Grok configuration, and user actions like generate, compose, and retry.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Layout wrapper with themed header, background image, footer, and global structure for all pages.
Fixed bottom bar rendering a primary action button with loading and disabled states.
frontend/src/components/ClipSegmentsList: Renders the list of generated clips with status indicators, progress, error handling, and optional Grok live view.
frontend/src/components/ClipVideoPreview: Displays a video clip with error handling, retry support, and fallback UI for missing or invalid URLs.
frontend/src/components/ComposedVideoPre: Handles client‑side video composition, progress display, errors, downloads, and preview of the final composed video.
frontend/src/components/ErrorNotice.tsx: Shows a reusable error alert with retry and start‑over action buttons.
frontend/src/components/GrokLiveView.tsx: Embeds Grok’s interface in an iframe with fallback handling when embedding is blocked.
frontend/src/components/MobileStepper.ts: Displays a step indicator for prompt, clips, compose, and download stages on mobile.
frontend/src/components/PromptComposer.t: Provides UI for entering prompts, configuring clip parameters, uploading reference images, and managing Grok runtime configuration.
frontend/src/components/ReferenceImageUp: Component for uploading, validating, previewing, and removing reference images with limits and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveGenerationProg: Computes live clip-generation progress with a timer-based smooth progress indicator.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching a video session and user sessions via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state and persists it to localStorage while updating the document class.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoProvider.ts: Tracks the selected video provider and whether Grok is properly configured, updating on runtime config changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useVideoSession.ts: Handles full video-generation workflow including session creation, segment status updates, clip generation, and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a coral-themed light/dark design system with responsive and mobile-friendly rules.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Provides a video download utility supporting blob and remote URLs with error handling and extension inference.
frontend/src/lib/duration.ts: Supplies duration calculations, tolerance checks, validation messages, and clip duration splitting utilities.
frontend/src/lib/fileEncoding.ts: Encodes image files to base64 for API use and handles multiple image encoding with error propagation.
frontend/src/lib/grokEndpoint.ts: Validates and normalizes Grok API endpoints, including canonicalization and format checks.
frontend/src/lib/grokRuntimeConfig.ts: Manages Grok runtime config in localStorage with validation, change events, and legacy endpoint detection.
frontend/src/lib/referenceImages.ts: Defines limits and utilities for validating, naming, sizing, and previewing reference image files.
frontend/src/lib/videoCompose.ts: Implements basic video composition flow with progress callbacks and fallback behavior for multiple clips.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Validates video URLs and clip data using HEAD checks or video element loading with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/providers/grokProvider.ts: Handles Grok AI config resolution, validates endpoints, encodes reference images, and sends video-generation requests with error handling.
frontend/src/providers/videoProvider.ts: Provides a wrapper around Grok provider functions, exposing clip generation and segment derivation using Grok as the sole video backend.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, container settings, and additional plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, including high-level goals, architectural notes, known issues, and tracked feature metadata for the Grok-powered video app.
